detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__42.sol#8)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__42.sol#15)
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__42.sol#121-125)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__42.sol#26)
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__42.sol#73-95)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__42.sol#50)
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__42.sol#128-136)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__42.sol#59)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__42.sol#139-143)

fallback() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Token.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__42.sol#160-166)
